string.text: My PDA is acting up during surges and psi-storms.
I can install a special coating that protects your PDA from external energy influences. That'll be 10000 rubles for materials and labor.
Done! Take your PDA. Now it will no longer crash during surges and psi-storms.
I wanna see squads on the global map in my PDA.
For this to happen, you need to connect the PDA to another satellite. I will do this, but you will make a contribution to science in the amount of 10000 rubles.
Fine. Give me your PDA. Okay... so... click "Accept"... and finally here... Take your PDA, I did it all.
Installed a special coating that protects PDA from external energy influences
The PDA is configured to display squads on the global map
